solution_line_template: Working together at the same time, the rate at which the two would be able to load compost would be {tractor_rate}+{darrel_rate}=<<{tractor_rate}+{darrel_rate}={combined_rate}>>{combined_rate} pounds/minute.

At {combined_rate} pounds/minute, the {total_compost_needed} pounds could be loaded in {total_compost_needed}/{combined_rate}=<<{total_compost_needed}/{combined_rate}={time_to_load}>>{time_to_load} minutes.
